class.name: PrinterAbortException
class.javadoc: The PrinterAbortException class is a subclass of{@link PrinterException} and is used to indicate that a user or application has terminated the print job while it was in the process of printing.
Constructs a new PrinterAbortException with no detail message.
Constructs a new PrinterAbortException with the specified detail message. msg the message to be generated when a PrinterAbortException is thrown
